headline: CarMax’s ChatGPT App Integration Could Be A Game Changer For CarMax (KMX)
summary: In February 2026, CarMax announced it had become the first U.S. auto retailer with a car-shopping app in the ChatGPT app store, enabling users to search its more than 45,000-vehicle inventory and access valuation tools directly within the AI platform. This move highlights how CarMax is trying to reshape the early stages of car buying and selling by combining conversational AI with its nationwide inventory and offer experience. Next, we’ll look at how integrating vehicle search and offers...
